text: Puurs is a former municipality in the Belgian province of Antwerp. It includes the towns of Liezele, Ruisbroek, Breendonk and Puurs proper. There is also the hamlet of Kalfort. On 1 January 2019, Puurs and Sint-Amands were merged into the new municipality of Puurs-Sint-Amands. In 2007, 16250 people lived there. It is at 51° 04 North, 04° 16 East. == References == Category:Former municipalities of Antwerp
title: Puurs
